traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The aerosaur has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The aerosaur makes one Bite attack and one Talons attack.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 27 (3d12 + 8 damage) piercing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target has the {@condition restrained} condition, and the aerosaur can't Bite another target.

actions.name: Talons
entries: Melee atk +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 24 (3d10 + 8 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Wing Gusts {@recharge 5}
entries: The aerosaur beats its wings, creating bursts of thunderous force. Each creature within 10 feet of the aerosaur must make a DC 20 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 38 (7d10 damage) thunder damage, is pushed up to 30 feet horizontally from the aerosaur, and has the {@condition prone} condition. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is pushed up to 15 feet horizontally from the aerosaur.
